abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose either Asleep, Burned, or Poisoned. The Defending Pok√©mon is now affected by that Special Condition. This power can't be used if Venusaur is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 4 damage counters from Venusaur.
